title: Region of Interest (ROI) schema

typeROI.description: Type of the ROI: implicit or explicit

status.description: Status of the ROI: saved or submitted

imageEntityId.description: Id of the image the ROI belongs to

materializedTaskId.description: Id of the materialized task used to created the ROI. If not set then the materialized task has not been submitted.

implicit.description: Object having all the implicit properties.

implicitRelationWithRoi.description: Type implicit relationship with the ROI. If the type of ROI is IMPLICIT.

implicitGemetryPointer.description: Geometry of the implicit point for the ROI. If the type of ROI is IMPLICIT.

pointProperties.description: Properties for a point in implicit pointer. If the implicitGemetryPointer is POINT.

worldCoordinates.description: World coordinates of the point, also called XYZ coordinates.

imageCoordinates.description: Images coordinates of the point, also called IJK coordinates.

explicit.description: Object having all the implicit properties.

labelMap.description: Object having the properties of the label map where the ROI was defined. For instance when a segmentation is done using paint brush.

imageEntityId.description: Id of the label map. A label map is an image in SPINE.

labelIntensity.description: Intensity in the label map assigned to the ROI. For instance 1. Usually the background is represented by 0.
